article_title: Tell the Tribune: Is there fraud at Utah substance-abuse treatment centers?

article_metadata.description: Lawmakers were told recently that fly-by-night substance-abuse treatment centers are cashing in on tens of millions of dollars in fraudulent billings by shopping for patients and in some instances providing no care or treatment. We ...
article_metadata.author: The Salt Lake Tribune
